name: KLM 737 Full Flight Experience - Amsterdam (AMS) to Berlin Tegel (TXL)
description:
Thanks for watching this Full Flight Experience!  For our ninth anniversary, my wife Beth and I decided to use some Delta miles and head over to Europe for a three-country tour. Our trip in November 2018 is one we'll never forgot; we still talk about it every day and reminisce fondly of the beautiful places we visited, the wonderful people we met, and the time we spent together.

A brief layover in Amsterdam let us stretch our legs, pick up some Holland souvenirs, and grab a snack before our final hop to Berlin Tegel aboard a KLM Boeing 737, a short, one-hour flight to our final destination. 

This video will take you from the pre-board to pushback, takeoff to landing and taxi at Berlin's Tegel Airport. It's a truly unusual international airport, one soon to be retired, as Berlin's Brandenburg Airport's imminent opening will consolidate the city's two airports. The final approach was beautiful, descending over the autumn trees north of Berlin.

Thanks for flying in, and stay tuned for the upcoming legs of this journey to and from Europe!

Video Timeline
00:30 - Boarding
00:45 - Pushback
03:00 - Takeoff
06:00 - At Altitude
07:30 - Approach
09:00 - Landing
10:45 - Gate Arrival
--------------------------------

Flight Information
Airline: KLM
Flight Number: KLM984
Date of Flight: Wednesday, November 7th, 2018

Origin Airport: Amsterdam Schiphol Airport (EHAM/AMS)
Destination Airport: Berlin Tegel Airport (EDDT/TXL)

Departing Gate: D48
Boarding Time: 09:32 CET
Scheduled Departure: 09:50 CET
Actual Departure from Gate: 09:54 CET
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 24 "Kaagbaan"/ 10:00 CET
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 26R / 10:58 CET
Scheduled Arrival: 11:10 CET
Actual Arrival at Gate: 11:03 CET
Arriving Gate: 11

--------------------------------

Aircraft Information
Type: Boeing 737-9K2
Registration: PH-BXS 
Aircraft Delivery: October 2001
Engines: 2 x CFM56-7B26
Seat: 24E & 24F

--------------------------------

Gear
Nikon D3200/18-55mm
Canon Vixia HFM30
Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro/IrfanView

Aircraft and flight information from airfleets.net and flightaware.com.
